content.text: 1 medium mango, peeled and finely diced
content.eamr: ( ing-0 "1 medium mango, peeled and finely diced" )
( ing-2 "1 kiwi, peeled and finely diced" )

content.text: 1 jalapeno pepper, seeded and finely chopped
content.eamr: ( ing-3 "1 jalapeno pepper, seeded and finely chopped" )

content.text: 0) Stir together mango, strawberries, kiwi, jalapeno, mint, and rum in a glass bowl.
content.eamr:
( inst-0 / R
	:inform ( ac-0-0 "Stir"@3:7 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-0 "mango"@17:22 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-1 "strawberries"@24:36 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-2 "kiwi"@38:42 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-3 "jalapeno"@44:52 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-4 "mint"@54:58 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-5 "rum"@64:67 / FOOD )
		:loc ( tool-0-0 "a glass bowl"@71:83 / TOOL )
	)
)

content.text: 1) Refrigerate for 1 to 3 hours, stirring once or twice.
